body_html: @zhangqianhui there are many ways for memory usage to grow without being a bug in TensorFlow (ie, your taining may be requesting increasing amounts of memory from TF). You could be allocating new variables, or modifying your graph between iterations. One possible (but unverified) possibility is that if you request many different sizes of tensors, your memory fragmentation could grow which increases memory usage
